name: markdown-editor-monorepo
description: Markdown Editor with Authentication and PostgreSQL

scripts.build: pnpm run build:client && pnpm run build:server
scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd client && pnpm install && cd ../server && pnpm install && cd ../api && pnpm install
scripts.db:setup: cd server && npx prisma generate && npx prisma db push
